statements.select: select tb_wlph_ID, tb_wlph_wpbs, tb_wlph_wpdm, tb_wlph_wlph, tb_wlph_cjfs, tb_wlph_sl, tb_wlph_ftime, tb_wlph_cjtb, tb_wlph_cjbs from tb_wlph where tb_wlph_ID = $value$
select tb_wlph_ID, tb_wlph_wpbs, tb_wlph_wpdm, tb_wlph_wlph, tb_wlph_cjfs, tb_wlph_sl, tb_wlph_ftime, tb_wlph_cjtb, tb_wlph_cjbs from tb_wlph
select tb_wlph_ID, tb_wlph_wpbs, tb_wlph_wpdm, tb_wlph_wlph, tb_wlph_cjfs, tb_wlph_sl, tb_wlph_ftime, tb_wlph_cjtb, tb_wlph_cjbs from tb_wlph
statements.insert:
insert into tb_wlph ( tb_wlph_wpbs, tb_wlph_wpdm, tb_wlph_wlph, tb_wlph_cjfs, tb_wlph_sl, tb_wlph_ftime, tb_wlph_cjtb, tb_wlph_cjbs ) values ( #tb_wlph_wpbs#, #tb_wlph_wpdm#, #tb_wlph_wlph#, #tb_wlph_cjfs#, #tb_wlph_sl#, #tb_wlph_ftime#, #tb_wlph_cjtb#, #tb_wlph_cjbs# )
select @@IDENTITY as value
statements.update:
update tb_wlph set
tb_wlph_wpbs = #tb_wlph_wpbs#,
tb_wlph_wpdm = #tb_wlph_wpdm#,
tb_wlph_wlph = #tb_wlph_wlph#,
tb_wlph_cjfs = #tb_wlph_cjfs#,
tb_wlph_sl = #tb_wlph_sl#,
tb_wlph_ftime = #tb_wlph_ftime#,
tb_wlph_cjtb = #tb_wlph_cjtb#,
tb_wlph_cjbs = #tb_wlph_cjbs#,
where tb_wlph_ID = $tb_wlph_ID$
